import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "../components/ui/card"; import { Button } from "../components/ui/button"; import { Badge } from "../components/ui/badge"; import { getProductById, getRelatedProducts } from "../data/mockDatabase"; import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext"; export default function ProductDetailPage() { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const { addToCart, isInCart, getItemQuantity } = useCart(); const product = getProductById(id); const relatedProducts = getRelatedProducts(parseInt(id)); if (!product) { return (
❌

Product Not Found

The product you're looking for doesn't exist.

); } const handleAddToCart = () => { addToCart(product.id, quantity); }; const handleRelatedProductClick = (productId) => { navigate(`/product/${productId}`); }; return (
{/* Breadcrumb */}
/ / {product.category} / {product.name}
{/* Product Image */}
{product.image}
{product.organic && ( 🌱 Certified Organic )}

From {product.farmSource}

{/* Product Badges */}
{product.originalPrice > product.price && ( {Math.round(((product.originalPrice - product.price) / product.originalPrice) * 100)}% OFF )} {product.inStock ? ( In Stock ) : ( Out of Stock )}
{/* Product Details */}
{/* Basic Info */}

{product.name}

{product.description}

{/* Rating */}
{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
{product.rating} ({product.reviews} reviews)
{/* Price */}
₹{product.price} {product.originalPrice > product.price && ( ₹{product.originalPrice} )} per {product.unit}
{product.originalPrice > product.price && (

You save ₹{product.originalPrice - product.price}!

)}
{/* Quantity Selector */}
{quantity} Total: ₹{product.price * quantity}
{/* Add to Cart */}
{/* Diet Compatibility */}

Diet Compatibility

{product.dietCompatible.map((diet) => ( ✓ {diet} ))}
{/* Product Information Tabs */}
{/* Nutrition Facts */} Nutrition Facts Per {product.unit}
Calories {product.nutritionFacts.calories}
Protein {product.nutritionFacts.protein}
Carbs {product.nutritionFacts.carbs}
Fat {product.nutritionFacts.fat}
Fiber {product.nutritionFacts.fiber}
{/* Health Benefits */} Health Benefits Why this is good for you
{product.benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit}
))}
{/* Source Information */} Source & Quality Where this comes from
Farm Source:

{product.farmSource}

Quality:

{product.organic ? "Certified Organic" : "Conventionally Grown"}

Category:

{product.category}
{/* Related Products */} {relatedProducts.length > 0 && (

Related Products

{relatedProducts.map((relatedProduct) => ( handleRelatedProductClick(relatedProduct.id)} >
{relatedProduct.image}
{relatedProduct.organic && ( Organic )}
{relatedProduct.name} {relatedProduct.unit}
₹{relatedProduct.price}
{relatedProduct.rating}
))}
)}
); }
